Week of November 3, 2014 <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/scale-out-your-big-data-apps> WEBINAR: SCALE OUT YOUR BIG DATA APPS: THE LATEST ON PIVOTAL GEMFIRE AND GEMFIRE XD Join Pivotal experts on November 12 to learn more about Pivotal GemFire and GemFire XD, and how modern Big Data technology can enhance applications.
Big Data for high-performing, scalable and reliable applications requires a new set of tools and technologies. Pivotal GemFire is a distributed in-memory NoSQL data management solution for creating high-scale custom applications. Pivotal GemFire XD supports structured data as part the industry’s first Hadoop-based platform for creating closed loop analytics solutions – enabling businesses to continuously optimize real-time automation in their applications. REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/scale-out-your-big-data-apps> EPISODE #5, Wednesday, NOVEMBER 5TH: INTERVIEW WITH AILEY CROW AT THE STRATA+HADOOP CONFERENCE <http://pivotal.io/podcasts> Join us this week for Episode #5 of our ongoing podcast series. All Things Pivotal covers technology at the intersection of cloud, agile development, and big data, and what it all means for business. This week Simon interviews Senior Data Scientist, Ailey Crow in New York City at the Strata Conference & Hadoop World. SUBSCRIBE <http://www.pivotal.io/podcasts> THIS MONTH IN DATA SCIENCE <http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/features/this-month-in-data-science-9> Data science is a hyper-growth environment. In this month’s roundup of the most compelling data science stories in the last month, we cover the perspective of how companies are competing on data science, where research dollars are flowing, how to predict the path of diseases like Ebola based on cell phone data, the top trends in the sector, and plenty of examples of data science being applied at companies like Netflix, Spotify, McLaren as well as a variety of industries and use cases from real-time mobile video to churn prediction.
READ MORE… <http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/features/this-month-in-data-science-9> THIS MONTH IN PAAS: TOP HEADLINES FOR PLATFORM AS A SERVICE <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/features/this-month-in-paas-top-headlines-for-platform-as-a-service> The PaaS space is growing leaps and bounds, and so is the volume of technology announcements, articles, and results in the space. In this post, Pivotal’s inaugural roundup of October’s key news and announcements, we cover everything from a deep dive on how GE views devops to technologies like Docker and microservices, Spring Cloud, and where Cloud Foundry might be going with OpenStack. Not to mention, Pivotal CF 1.3 was released—our fourth release in under a year!
